si.title: புறக்கோட்டையில் சடலம் ஒன்று மீட்பு
body_lines: මෙම පුද්ගලයෙකුගේ මළ සිරුර අද උදෑසන කොළඹ පාවෙන ව්යාපාරික සංකීර්ණයක දී සොයාගෙන තිබේ.

en.title: Recovery of the corpse in the outskirts
body_lines: The body of a man has been found this morning at a floating business complex in Colombo - Police said.
